title: Record fallback demo video
description:
Screen recording if live demo fails.

## Recording
- Tool: Loom or QuickTime
- Duration: 2-3 minutes
- Show full flow with real data
- Add voiceover explaining each step

## Scenarios to record
1. Happy path - full demo flow
2. Key moment - the "$152k found" reveal
3. Recommendation approval and execution

## When to use
- If Meta OAuth fails during demo
- If API is slow/unresponsive
- If any technical issues occur
